root.name: MLB SlugFest 20-04
root.description: OverviewMLB Slugfest 2004 is similar to its predecessor in its loose take on baseball. Runners are allowed to perform "hard slides" and punches which can knock the ball out of a fielder's hand while fielders can apply "hard tags". These can be used to build your turbo meter and allows players to become "on fire" which enhances your player's stats and gives them unlimited turbo.
